mapper.select: select UnitCode, UnitName, TimeUnitDD as CalcDate, SortOrder, InKPICount, TotalCount, round(TotalDuration/TotalCount, 1) as AvgDuration, TotalDuration, TotalCWCount, KPINorm, InKPIRatioAvg, LoadedFlCount, RetardedCount, FullOkCount from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_kpi_data( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_TimeUnitID => #{timeUnitId} )) order by SortOrder

select UnitCode, UnitName, TimeUnitDD as CalcDate, SortOrder, InKPICount, TotalCount, round(TotalDuration/TotalCount, 1) as AvgDuration, TotalDuration, TotalCWCount, KPINorm, InKPIRatioAvg, LoadedFlCount, RetardedCount, FullOkCount, S1StartDate, round(S1Duration, 1) as S1Duration, S2StartDate, round(S2Duration, 1) as S2Duration, S3StartDate, round(S3Duration, 1) as S3Duration, CompanyINN from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_kpi_data( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_DimensionID => #{systemUnitId} )) order by SortOrder

select UnitCode, UnitName, TimeUnitDD as CalcDate, SortOrder, InKPICount, TotalCount, round(TotalDuration/TotalCount, 1) as AvgDuration, TotalDuration, TotalCWCount, KPINorm, InKPIRatioAvg, LoadedFlCount, RetardedCount, FullOkCount, S1StartDate, round(S1Duration, 1) as S1Duration, S2StartDate, round(S2Duration, 1) as S2Duration, S3StartDate, round(S3Duration, 1) as S3Duration, CompanyINN from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_kpi_data( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_TimeUnitID => #{timeUnitId}, p_DimensionID => #{systemUnitId} )) order by SortOrder

select CompanyName, INN, CityName, ManagerName, S1StartDate, round(S1Duration, 2) as S1Duration, S2StartDate, round(S2Duration, 2) as S2Duration, S3StartDate, round(S3Duration, 2) as S3Duration, round(TotalDuration, 2) as TotalDuration, IsInKPI, BushName, OOName OperationOfficeName from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_kpi_data_detail( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait} )) order by SortOrder

select UnitName as CompanyName, CompanyINN as INN, CityName, ManagerName, ROStartDate, ROFinishDate, round(TotalDuration, 2) as TotalDuration, BushName, OOName OperationOfficeName from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_kpi_data( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_DimensionID => 100 )) order by SortOrder

select unitCode, unitname, timeUnitDD as CalcDate, companyCount, startedOkCount from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_crm_fill_quality2( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_TimeUnitID => #{timeUnitId} ))

select unitCode, unitname, timeUnitDD as CalcDate, companyCount, startedOkCount from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_crm_fill_quality2( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_TimeUnitID => #{timeUnitId}, p_DimensionID => #{systemUnitId} ))

select unitCode, unitname, companyInn, substageId, companyCount from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_crm_fill_quality( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_DimensionID => #{systemUnitId} ))

select round(sum(decode(sign(substageId), 1, companyCount/(6+3)))/ nullif(sum(decode(sign(substageId), -1, companyCount)), 0) * 100, 2) TotalValue, round(sum(decode(trunc(substageId/100), 1, companyCount/6))/ nullif(sum(decode(sign(substageId), -1, companyCount)), 0) * 100, 2) FirstStageValue, round(sum(decode(trunc(substageId/100), 2, companyCount/3))/ nullif(sum(decode(sign(substageId), -1, companyCount)), 0) * 100, 2) SecondStageValue, timeUnitDD AS CalcDate from table ( pkg_zp_api.get_crm_fill_quality( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTill => #{endDate}, p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_CompanyPINs => #{companyIds}, p_ManagerCodes => #{managerIds}, p_AccOpenSchemeID => #{openingSchemaTypeId}, p_AccOpenTypeID => #{openingTypeId}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}, p_ZPSchemeIDs => #{schemaTypeIds}, p_WithClientWait => #{withClientWait}, p_TimeUnitID => #{timeUnitId} )) group by timeUnitDD order by CalcDate

select round(pkg_zp_api.get_inkpi_treshold( p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}) , 2) from dual

select round(pkg_zp_api.get_retarded_treshold( p_BushIDs => #{bushIds}, p_OOIDs => #{operationOfficeIds}, p_CityCodes => #{cityIds}, p_AccOpenStageIDs => #{processStageIds}, p_AccOpenSubStageID => #{subProcessStageId}) , 2) from dual
